title: Essentials插件(用户组权限管理插件)
author: MC神魔族
txt_content: 比如怎么取消这些权利   在玩家权利组怎么取消这些权利 求助！！！eco gm give  kill tp tpall  hat &

replies.author: 诺尘_
replies.txt_content:
再发一遍
eco
/mangdelp 组 essentials.eco
gm
/mangdelp 组 essentials.gamemode
give
/mangdelp 组 essentials.give
kill
/mangdelp 组 essentials.kill
tp
/mangdelp 组 essentials.tp
tpall
/mangdelp 组 essentials.tpall
hat
/mangdelp 组 essentials.hat
&
/mangdelp 组 essentials.chat.color
/mangdelp 组 essentials.chat.format

replies.author: 拉结尔之书
replies.txt_content:
这些基本权限可以试试通过添加负权限来实现，例如
/mangaddp 组 -权限名
